description:
Play as three new characters with this fifth character pack! Wield weapons as your favorite characters from the hit movie One Piece Film: Red and enjoy even more Pirate Warrior action!

Includes Additional Playable Characters:
• Uta (Film: Red)
• Shanks (Film: Red)
• Koby (Film: Red)
name: ONE PIECE: PIRATE WARRIORS 4 One Piece Film: Red Pack
